pageContext.title: In brief: Go-Jek adds daily deals marketplace
pageContext.content:
Today, Go-Jek introduced Go-Deals, a mobile marketplace that presents special offers and discounts from various categories of daily needs.

“Through Go-Deals, Go-Jek’s loyal customers can find more than 1,000 vouchers for attractive offers from 15 categories that will make it easier for them to carry out their daily activities,” said Michael Perera, vice president, Go-Deals.

Source: Go-Jek

The 15 “daily needs” categories featured on Go-Deals include food, hobbies, services, and travel. Users will also be able to search for “new deals” to find the latest coupons added to the marketplace by Go-Jek’s merchant partners, as well as for special “regional deals” that are available on a city-by-city basis.

Users will be able to purchase vouchers using Go-Pay, and make donations to selected charities through the platform of up to IDR 50,000 (US$3.29) in value.

Currency converted from Indonesian rupiah. Rate: US$1 = IDR 15,205.75

seo.title: Go-Jek launches daily deals marketplace
seo.description: It’s called Go-Deals, and covers 15 categories from food to travel.
